subject: Order SSN5469
description_text:
Hi good morning,

To update I will be receiving my parcel today from  Order SSN5469. I’m still waiting on a confirmation weather the control box is going to be with the H Shifter as at the moment I’m unable to use the clutch pedal I ordered.

When ordering I was positive as per your listing that the box is included and that it’s an easy setup plug and play. Wich is not the case at the moment. 

Therefore could i pleas get someone to confirm if the Control Box is with the other package on expecting today. 

Best regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrykorzel04,       The clutch pedal is sold as a standalone accessory and does not include a controller box. A controller box is only included when purchasing a 2-pedal or 3-pedal set. The shifter has already been shipped. Please keep an eye on the tracking updates.

Good morning,

Thank you for getting back to me, but this is not something you make clear.
I understand what you’re saying. On your website there is no mention that
the box has to be ordered as a standalone item. I have read and looked
through the whole site to finding nothing.

The H shifter did arrive yesterday. But as I’m unable to use them they are
useless to me there for I would like to request a refund and I would like
to return the items.

As I’m based in the Uk I did see you have a warehouse based in
Hertfordshire which I will be sending the item too.

If you’d like to help me resolve this please let me know other wise the
items will be returned and a honest review will be left.

Best regards,
Patryk


On Wed, 7 Jan 2026 at 6:10 am, support@simsonn.com
Hi Patrykorzel04,    You can purchase a separate Plus X control box, and we'll waive the shipping fee for you. Is that acceptable? Additionally, the H shifter does not require a control box.

I can accept that I’m happy to pay for the control box if you can cover the
shipping fee, thank you for the offer.

Is there a discount code you can provide for me to enter on your website?
